that's where we do our speech

so typically when you make a request to

from
modify or whatever request the user made

these smaller white templates are what

a device that tends to have a smaller
screen that's much closer to people and
in that case when you make a response
you're gonna take over the full screen
but we also have as you can see these

we'll show you different ways that you

on the right you can see that we have
what's say a now playing card in that
case if someone's requesting a piece of

hey I got my audio first and my visual
later what should I do in many cases
it's okay you should use two different

template directive and the render
template directive only has four

one which is your standard text response
then we have body template two which is
below that that's where you see the text
plus a picture we also have the list
template which is on the lower left this
list templates actually very flexible
you can use it for all kinds of things
we use it for calendars to-do lists
shopping lists things like that and then
of course on the upper left everyone's

all know and love and then of course the
only other
active is the render player info
